channel.title: [PI] Summoning npcs don't attack
channel.description: Currently the summoning npcs do not attack anything. If I would click on a NPC it will move to it but nothing will happen. If I would use a Steel Titan it will not attack anything but I would use the special it will do do damage. I'm not sure what class this would be handled in or what methods to call to make them attack so any help is appreciated.
